headline: S&P 500, Nasdaq close at records; Deckers soars on UGG demand
summary: (Reuters) -The S&P 500 and Nasdaq notched record high closes on Friday, lifted by optimism the U.S. could soon reach a trade deal with the European Union, while Deckers Outdoor surged following a strong quarter for the maker of UGG boots and Hoka sneakers.  European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen will meet U.S. President Donald Trump on Sunday in Scotland after EU officials and diplomats said they expected to reach a framework trade deal this weekend.  Trump said earlier that the odds of a U.S.-EU trade deal were "50-50".

content.title: S&P 500, Nasdaq close at records; Deckers soars on UGG demand
content.summary: (Reuters) -The S&P 500 and Nasdaq notched record high closes on Friday, lifted by optimism the U.S. could soon reach a trade deal with the European Union, while Deckers Outdoor surged following a strong quarter for the maker of UGG boots and Hoka sneakers.  European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen will meet U.S. President Donald Trump on Sunday in Scotland after EU officials and diplomats said they expected to reach a framework trade deal this weekend.  Trump said earlier that the odds of a U.S.-EU trade deal were "50-50".

headline: How major US stock indexes fared Friday, 7/25/2025

headline: Centene outlook, Pinnacle & Synovus, Deckers: Trending Tickers
summary: Centene (CNC) stock rises despite the company pulling its full-year outlook. Pinnacle (PNFP) and Synovus (SNV) are set to merge in an $8.6 billion deal, marking the largest bank merger so far in 2025. Deckers (DECK) stock surges after its quarterly results showed strong demand for its products. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief here.

headline: Deckers: Fiscal Q1 Earnings Snapshot
summary: On a per-share basis, the Goleta, California-based company said it had net income of 93 cents. The results beat Wall Street expectations. The average estimate of 11 analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of 68 cents per share.

content.title: Deckers: Fiscal Q1 Earnings Snapshot
content.summary: On a per-share basis, the Goleta, California-based company said it had net income of 93 cents. The results beat Wall Street expectations. The average estimate of 11 analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of 68 cents per share.

headline: Deckers shares soar on rising demand for Hoka, UGG footwears in China, Europe
summary: Solid demand for Hoka shoes and UGG boots in Europe and China shielded Deckers from the impact of tariff-related concerns and sticky inflation on consumer spending in the U.S., its largest market by revenue.  "Coming off a spectacular fiscal 2025, Deckers faces uneven U.S. sportswear demand, higher tariffs on imports and tough comparisons after strong Hoka wholesale sell-in last year," said Morningstar analyst David Swartz in a note.

content.title: Deckers shares soar on rising demand for Hoka, UGG footwears in China, Europe
content.summary: Solid demand for Hoka shoes and UGG boots in Europe and China shielded Deckers from the impact of tariff-related concerns and sticky inflation on consumer spending in the U.S., its largest market by revenue.  "Coming off a spectacular fiscal 2025, Deckers faces uneven U.S. sportswear demand, higher tariffs on imports and tough comparisons after strong Hoka wholesale sell-in last year," said Morningstar analyst David Swartz in a note.

headline: Wall Street's winning week ends with more records for US stocks
summary: The Dow Jones Industrial Average climbed 208 points, or 0.5%, and the Nasdaq composite added 0.2% to its own record set the day before.  Edwards Lifesciences rose 5.5% after likewise topping Wall Street’s expectations for profit in the latest quarter.

content.summary: The Dow Jones Industrial Average climbed 208 points, or 0.5%, and the Nasdaq composite added 0.2% to its own record set the day before.  Edwards Lifesciences rose 5.5% after likewise topping Wall Street’s expectations for profit in the latest quarter.
